items.name: Void Battery
explicitMods: 80% reduced Spell Damage
20% increased Cast Speed
50% increased Global Critical Strike Chance
+40 to maximum Mana
+1 to Maximum Power Charges
25% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
flavourText: "The trick is to give nothingness,
and to receive everything in return."
- Inquisitor Maligaro

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that has a duration.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 19% more Damage
Supported Skills have 59% less Skill Effect Duration
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports non-instant spell skills.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 49% increased Cast Speed
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Movement, Lightning, Travel

socketedItems.secDescrText: Waits for a duration before teleporting to a targeted destination, with the duration based on the distance and your movement speed. When the teleport occurs, lightning damage is dealt to the area around both where the player was and where they teleported to. Casting again will queue up multiple teleportations to occur in sequence.
explicitMods: Deals 51 to 965 Lightning Damage
+0.4 metres to radius
Can queue up to 50 uses
49% reduced Duration
10% less Duration
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Surgebinders
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
explicitMods: 110% increased Armour and Evasion
7% increased Elemental Damage per Frenzy Charge
4% increased Physical Damage per Endurance Charge
7% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
10% chance to Steal Power, Frenzy, and Endurance Charges on Hit
flavourText: Your lies are our strength.
Your threats are our laughter.
Your hate is our infinity
The fire rises!

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
explicitMods: This Gem gains 15% increased Experience
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants bonuses to damage and critical strike chance of spells to you and your allies, and gives a chance to create Consecrated Ground against stronger enemies.
explicitMods: +1.9 metres to radius
You and nearby Non-Minion Allies have a 10% chance to create Consecrated Ground on Hitting a Rare or Unique Enemy, lasting 8 seconds
You and nearby allies have 39% increased Spell Critical Strike Chance
You and nearby allies deal 15% more Spell Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants extra cold damage based on physical damage to you and your allies.
explicitMods: +1.9 metres to radius
2% increased Area of Effect
You and nearby allies gain 25% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
You and nearby allies deal 18% more Cold Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Malachai's Loop
explicitMods: 231% increased Energy Shield
+2 to Maximum Power Charges
20% chance to gain a Power Charge on Hit
16% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
Lose all Power Charges on reaching Maximum Power Charges
Shocks you when you reach Maximum Power Charges
flavourText: Thaumaturgy has no limit.
It is our fragile reality that imposes boundaries.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports aura skills that create permanent auras around you, changing their reservation to a cost and making them temporary. Cannot support banner or stance skills.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 28% increased Aura effect
Supported Skills Cost +220 Mana

Supported Skills also count as Blessing Skills
You can only have one Aura on you from your Blessing Skills
Auras from Supported Skills have a base duration of 10.80 seconds
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that adds lightning damage to the attacks of you and your allies, and makes your spells deal more lightning damage.
explicitMods: +1.9 metres to radius
You and nearby allies deal 16 to 248 additional Lightning Damage with Attacks
You and nearby allies deal 21% more Spell Lightning Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Call of the Brotherhood
explicitMods: +19 to Intelligence
30% increased Lightning Damage
36% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
48% of Lightning Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Your spells have 100% chance to Shock against Frozen Enemies
flavourText: Forged by three brothers
so that they may recognize each other
across any distance of time or travel.

items.name: Corruption Clasp
explicitMods: +24 to maximum Energy Shield
+30 to maximum Life
Regenerate 28.8 Life per second
+31 to maximum Mana
+33% to Lightning Resistance

items.name: Rotgut
explicitMods: 50% chance to gain a Flask Charge when you deal a Critical Strike
43% increased Duration
Consumes Frenzy Charges on use
Gain Onslaught for 3 seconds per Frenzy Charge on use
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: Rancid, rotten, and wicked are those that dare to taste my serum.

items.name: Ralakesh's Impatience
enchantMods: You take 10% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes if you've taken a Critical Strike Recently
explicitMods: +16% to Cold Resistance
+15% to Chaos Resistance
30% increased Movement Speed
Lose all Frenzy, Endurance, and Power Charges when you Move

Minimum Endurance Charges equal to Maximum while stationary
Minimum Frenzy Charges equal to Maximum while stationary
Minimum Power Charges equal to Maximum while stationary
flavourText: For the immortal, what is the difference
between an age and an instant?

Supports skills with cooldowns.

items.name: Bottled Faith
explicitMods: 30% reduced Duration
Consecrated Ground created by this Flask has Tripled Radius
Consecrated Ground created during Effect applies 10% increased Damage taken to Enemies
139% increased Critical Strike Chance against Enemies on Consecrated Ground during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A tourniquet for the soul, squeezing ethereal into physical.

items.name: Badge of the Brotherhood
explicitMods: Your Maximum Frenzy Charges is equal to your Maximum Power Charges
7% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate of Travel Skills per Frenzy Charge
7% increased Effect of Elusive on you per Power Charge
22% chance to lose a Frenzy Charge when you use a Travel Skill
21% chance to lose a Power Charge when you gain Elusive
flavourText: Greater than any blade, agility and intellect will be your weapons.

items.name: Dialla's Malefaction
explicitMods: Gems can be Socketed in this Item ignoring Socket Colour
Gems Socketed in Red Sockets have +2 to Level
Gems Socketed in Green Sockets have +30% to Quality
Gems Socketed in Blue Sockets gain 100% increased Experience
Has no Attribute Requirements
flavourText: He took me by my hand, promised me power beyond compare.
But I did not do it for power.
I did it for love.
And I'd do it again in an instant.
